---
title:  "Vanderbilt Biostatistics Summer Internship: Regression"
---

This is a series of five 90 minute lectures taught by [Simon](http://simonvandekar.github.io) as part of the Department of Biostatistics Summer Internship at Vanderbilt University. The course is part two of a 10 day series to introduce undergraduate students interested in medical science, biology, and mathematics to Biostatistical methods.

# Syllabus (Tentative)

## Class 6

Objectives:

1.  Introductions
2.  Understand the concepts of simple linear regression
3.  Know how to interpret simple regression coefficients

## Day 7

Objectives:

1.  Understand the concepts of multiple regression
2.  Know how to interpret multiple coefficients
